warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Extend arms to the sides and make small circles, gradually increasing the size. Perform 2 sets of 30 seconds each direction.
Swing arms forward and backward, opening up the chest. Perform 2 sets of 15 reps.

warmup_exercises.setup_notes: Start on all fours with hands under shoulders and knees under hips.
warmup_exercises.execution_notes: Alternate between arching your back (cow) and rounding it (cat). Perform 2 sets of 10 reps.

exercises.setup: Sit down at a lat pull-down machine and adjust the knee pad to fit snugly against your thighs.
execution: Grip the bar with a wide grip, palms facing forward.
Pull the bar down to your upper chest while keeping your back straight.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly return to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
exercises.weight: Select a weight where the last 2-3 reps feel challenging but still allow you to maintain proper form.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Sit at the lat pull-down machine and adjust the knee pad. Use a neutral grip attachment.
alternative_exercise_execution: Grip the handles with palms facing each other.
Pull the handles down to your upper chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the bottom.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, similar to the wide grip version.
exercises.additional_tips: Focus on engaging your lats and avoid using momentum to pull the bar down.

exercises.setup: Use a preacher bench to angle your upper arm.
execution: Sit on the preacher bench with your upper arms resting on the pad.
Grip the barbell or dumbbell with an underhand grip.
Curl the weight up towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Lower the weight slowly back to the starting position, maintaining tension.
exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, focusing on maintaining tension in the stretched position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_setup: Stand facing away from a low cable machine with a handle attachment.
alternative_exercise_execution: Grip the handle with an underhand grip.
Step forward to create tension in the cable.
Curl the handle towards your shoulder, keeping your elbow stationary.
Slowly return to the starting position.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, ensuring high tension in the stretched position.
exercises.additional_tips: Keep your elbows locked in place to prevent cheating and maximize biceps engagement.
